snippet: The Department of Defense has identified two American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
abstract: Defense Department confirms death of American service member in operations against Islamic State militant group.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified two American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
